body.p: WSO2 Data Services Server is a convenient mechanism to provide a Web service interface for data stored in some data sources.

Data sources such as relational databases, CSV files, Microsoft Excel files & Google spreadsheets can be easily service enabled using Data Services Server. Now, the data can be exposed and accessed in a secure(using WS-Security) and reliable(using WS-ReliableMessaging) manner, and is also available for mashing-up with other Web services.
WSO2 Data Services Server is built on Apache Axis2 and the related family of projects.
An open source product, WSO2 Data Services Server is available under the Apache Software License (v2.0) . This includes all of the extra integration and management functionalities as well.

ul.li: Service enable data locked in relational databases, CSV, Microsoft Excel files & Google spreadsheets
Zero code approach - simple XML descriptor file is all you need
Easy configuration via web based graphical console / Eclipse plugin wizard
Aggregate data from multiple data sources
Support for exposing Stored procedures & functions
Throttling to ensure that your database is never overloaded
Try-it tool to test the services on the fly

body.h2: Open Source components included in WSO2 Data Services Server

ul.li: Apache Axiom (High performance XML Object Model)
AJAX based Management Console with complete administration capability of the server
WSDL2Java/Java2WSDL & and Try it(invoke/test data services on the fly)
